meta_title: What is LCA? Life Cycle Assessment Meaning & Definition
meta_description: Life Cycle Assessment (LCA) provides a framework for measuring environmental impacts across an asset's lifespan. Use this guide to optimize maintenance and ROI.
title: LCA Meaning: What is Life Cycle Assessment?
